column6: Shaft anodes need replacing on next service. Deterioration of paint and possibly hull around the intake strainer thru-hulls.
Time to replace transom anode plate within 4 months
Paint worn through along the edges of the keel and hull, thru-hulls and transducer. Thru-hulls need wire wheeling for proper evaluation.
Rudders and trim tabs are losing paint in flakes.
Shaft anodes may need replacing on next service
Will return to install 2x port shaft anodes
Installed 2 x 1-3/4” heavy duty shaft zincs on port shaft
Port prop showing signs of electrolysis. Port shaft anodes appear to be functioning properly.
New port shaft and transom anodes needed on next service
